title: uTorrent Stable 3.4 build 30635
description:
Changelog:
 
-- 2014-03-05: Version 3.4 (build 30635) Stable
- Fixed: Update issue
- Fixed: Install screen
 
-- 2014-02-26: Version 3.4 (build 30620)
- Fixed: Crash on Windows XP
- Fixed: When updating from 3.3.2 or below default view changed to Bundles instead of staying on prior default view
- Fixed: Rare crash on all OS's
 
-- 2014-02-14: Version 3.4 (build 30596)



uTorrent ad blockning

Options > Preferences > Advanced:

bt.enable_pulse...(false)
distributed_share.enable...(false)
gui.show_notorrents_node...(false)
gui.show_plus_upsell...(false)
offers.404_disable...(true)
offers.404_dismiss...(true)
offers.content.offer_autoexec...(false)
offers.featured_content_url...(leave blank)
offers.left_rail_offer_enabled...(false)
offers.sponsored_torrent_offer_enabled...(false)

I can also recommend adding the following to your Windows hosts file:

127.0.0.1     bench.utorrent.com

127.0.0.1     update.bittorrent.com

127.0.0.1     utclient.utorrent.com

127.0.0.1     cdn.ap.bittorrent.com

127.0.0.1     bundles.bittorrent.com

127.0.0.1     apps.bittorrent.com

And these for disable ads:

127.0.0.1     ads.bittorrent.com
127.0.0.1     offers.bittorrent.com
